original: Öberg, Thure Ferdinand, civilingenjör, direktör, Huskvarna, f. 30/3/93 i Vännäs, Västerb. 1., av kyrkoh., teol. dr Ferdinand Ö. o. Emilia Axberg. G. 20 m. Helfrid Krook. Barn: Birgit f. 21, g. m. civ:jägm<. Gunnar Wistedt, Margareta 24, Lars Olov 26. — Stud:-ex. i Umeå 14, KTH (E) 15-19. Lab:-ing. v. ASEA i Ludvika 19-24, verkst:- ing. o. assist, åt verkst :chefen där 24-34, övering. o. driftchef v. Konfektions A-B Junex i Huskvarna 34-42, tekn. dir. v. Norrahammars Bruk 42-46, verkst. dir. i Husqvarna Vapen-fabr. A-B sed. 46. Lär. v. Ludvika stads lärl:- o. yrkessk. 20-34, sakk. i 38 års unif :koimm., övering. i försv:-väs. verkst :nd 40-41, chef f. ind:-komm. textilsekt. konfektionsbyrå 41-42, led. av 42 års mil. reparationstj :-utredn., led. av Ludvika folksk :stvr. 31-34, kyrkofullm. 32-34, ordf. i Huskvarna nykterh :nd, v. ordf. i verkstyr. 38-42, ordf. i styr. f. Jönköp. 1. centr. yrkessk. 48, led. av il. komm. utredn. o. ko’mim. samt av ett flert. bolags- o. fören:styr. Medl. av Sv. tekn :fören.. Frimurarorden, Par Bricole, Rotarykl. m. fl. fören. o. sällsk. Skr.: art. i tidn. o. tidskr. RVOlkl.
translated: Öberg, Thure Ferdinand, civil engineer, director, Huskvarna, b. 30/3/93 in Vännäs, Västerbotten, son of reverend, theology doctor Ferdinand Ö. and Emilia Axberg. Married on 20, with Helfrid Krook. Children: Birgit b. 21, married to civil forester Gunnar Wistedt, Margareta b. 24, Lars Olov b. 26. - Passed exams in Umeå in 14, KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) (E) from 15-19. Laboratory engineer at ASEA in Ludvika from 19-24, worked as a senior engineer and assistant to the chief engineer there from 24-34, chief engineer and production manager at Konfektions AB Junex in Huskvarna from 34-42, technical director at Norrahammars Bruk from 42-46, executive director at Husqvarna Vapenfabrik AB since 46. Teacher at Ludvika city apprentice and vocational school from 20-34, expert member in the uniform committee for 38 years, chief engineer at the defense procurement agency from 40-41, head of the industrial commission textile sector at the garment bureau from 41-42, member of the military repair service investigation committee in 42, member of Ludvika primary school board from 31-34, church representative from 32-34, chairman of Huskvarna temperance association, vice chairman of the board from 38-42, chairman of the board for Jönköping 1st central vocational school in 48, member of the municipal investigation and commission committees and several corporate and association boards. Member of the Swedish Association of Technical Engineers, Freemasons Order, Par Bricole, Rotary Club, and others. Writer of articles in newspapers and magazines. Recipient of the Royal Order of Vasa, class I.
